evidence: Clear separation of concerns with distinct layers: model, operations, utils, and errors
Models inherit from base classes and use mixins, indicating a structured domain layer
Operations layer (get, list, data_list) abstracts data access patterns
Utils layer provides common functionality (api_key_util, request_type_util)
Error handling is centralized in a dedicated errors module
Connection class serves as a infrastructure layer for HTTP communications
API configuration is separated into its own module (api_config)
Package structure shows logical grouping by functionality rather than features
risks: Some cross-cutting concerns like API configuration are not fully decoupled
Operations and models have some tight coupling
Limited evidence of explicit port/adapter patterns for external integrations
